description:
AWARD WINNING AUTO REPAIR & MAINTENANCE SERVICE

Whether it’s an auto emergency, a roadside breakdown, or just a small problem, RepairPal can help.  The award winning RepairPal app tells you the right price to pay for your repair, finds you a great mechanic in the area, tracks all your repairs, and gives you one-touch access to roadside assistance.

Be prepared 24/7 for a car emergency.  Get the peace of mind and confidence you need to get behind the wheel of your automobile.  With RepairPal, you’re covered everywhere you go in the United States.

"Best Damn iPhone App I've seen in a while"
- iSource

Features:

SAVE MONEY.  Get an accurate and unbiased repair and service estimates. Know the fair price to pay before you take your car to the shop.

FIND A GREAT SHOP.  With the most comprehensive GPS-enabled repair shop directory, RepairPal helps you find a recommended repair and maintenance shop near you.

GET ROADSIDE ASSISTANCE.  RepairPal brings roadside assistance into the 21st century by allowing you to pay only when you actually need the help, instead of paying an annual membership fee.

TRACK YOUR REPAIRS. Keep your complete repair history with you. Record what you've done and make a checklist of what you need to do next. All data is synced between the app and RepairPal.com.

STAY IN SYNC.  Sync your MyCar account on RepairPal.com, checklist, and repair history - Everything you need is with you, wherever you are.

STAY SAFE. Make car travels worry and hassle free – get the peace of mind and confidence you need before getting behind the wheel.   

Never be left out in the cold if your car breaks down.  RepairPal makes it easy to stay safe and connected anytime, anywhere.

Please email us at team@repairpal.com if you have any feedback, requests or issues with the application. 

Notes:
* RepairPal works in the US and covers most models 1990 and newer.
* Roadside Assistance feature requires an iPhone.
* RepairPal requires an internet connection to function properly.

Awards & Accolades:
-PC Magazine Names RepairPal.com among The Top 100 Undiscovered Web Sites
-CNET "RepairPal is a great idea and nicely executed too."
-Newsweek "Be in the know on your next trip to the mechanic."
-RepairPal Awarded Runner-up for 2008 Emerging Technology Award by BusinessJournal
-LAPTOP Recognizes RepairPal as a Top 50 Web Tool of 2008
